name: Stars Within Reach
description: Karael is a princess on her way to get married and learn how to run the kingdom once her father is gone. However, not all went as planned. An attack was sent on the kingdom and Karael barely escaped with her life. In the events that follow, an ancient cult rears its ugly head and a cataclysm is set in motion to change the very world Karael had grown to love. She will fight for her survival!
